modmenu.descriptionTranslation.vkm: A Vanilla Keybind Manager for all of your keybinds to exist within the MaLiLib Ecosystem
vkm.config.generic.comment.categoryColor:
The prefix color of Categories for Keybind displays
This configuration uses the Vanilla color Formatter syntax
vkm.config.generic.comment.nameColorPref:
The prefix color of Ids for Keybind displays
This configuration uses the Vanilla color Formatter syntax
vkm.config.hotkeys.comment.resetAllVanil: Reset All Vanilla Keybinds to their defaults.
vkm.message.reset_all_keybinds.error: You need to close all open screens before resetting all Vanilla keybinds.
vkm.message.reset_all_keybinds.success: All Vanilla Keybinds has been reset to their default values
